#summary Planned and possible features

For changes that are done, but not released yet, please see the UnreleasedChanges page.

== General ==

  * Allow the user to specify a random seed for city generation
  * Option to include/exclude chests (and make valuable materials into common materials)
  * Use Copy Chunk
  * Credits page
  * Rail system
  * Rotation should work with doors, signs, chests, etc
  * Allow for putting the city in an existing world
  * Better alignment wih chunk ranges

== Possible Features ==

These things might be too ambitious or just not possible.

  * Multiple cities
  * Possible to make a nicer connection between the city terrain and the natural terrain?
  * Possible to set the world edited time of the files? (so it appears at the top of the list)
  * Maybe a way to set/generate the terrain near the city
